Visibility: 0.8 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
